attributes.additional_details:
We the signers of the petition ask the goverment of the united kingdom to grant the people suffering disabilitys highest priority over asylum seekers for housing and benifits.

we as the people ask that an asylum seeker not have priorty over a British disabled person wether they are child or elderly.

we ask that and asylum seeker claiming dissabilitys undergo strict tests, and still have second priority to disabled british people.

we as the british people must look after our own before looking after the interests of another we do not see other countries offering us benifits and housing over there so we should not offer priority here for them.

Disabled british students should have priority over disabled Foreign students and adults.

This petition was made by a severly disabled student of britain, who has decided to fight back.
